frontmatter.title: Co-Parenting Couselors: They are the worst!.

node.excerpt: You would think to be a mental health professional that you could identify people’s disorders fairly quickly. All it took was one conversation with two different therapists to learn they thought the…
It’s December 28th, 2017. Around 3 pm we get a knock on the door. It is the police department. They tell me they want to speak to my husband because of an incident that happened at the courthouse…

When you hear the word stepmom does your mind automatically go to Cinderella and her evil stepmother? Fortunately for me my life so far as a stepmom hasn’t been that way. My stepdaughter was 11 months…
